title: Ten Simple Tips to Help You Plan Your China...
text:
Updated Articles and Resources 
Planning your travel to China can be daunting but don't let it be. And don't let anyone tell you otherwise - it is wonderful that you're thinking of coming to China. Come alone, come with your family, come on your own or with a group - just come. I don't think you'll regret a moment of it and it will be the trip of a lifetime. I'm here to help you make it simple with these easy steps to guide you in your China Travel Planning. China is a big country. Where to go first?. Map: courtesy of ABCTeach.com 1. Decide Where to Go in China 
China is an enormous country with diverse options for travel. You can be as adventurous or "safe" as you want - in other words you can get pretty far off the Western Tourist Travel Trail or you can stay right on it. There may be certain things you absolutely feel you must see, or other places you didn't even know were in China. A good way to get a feel for China is to browse my Destinations Guide . A good way to find out more about historic sites is to peruse the UNESCO Site list
